message:
and everything worked fine for a while but today i've discovered that when accessing my app in a browser, it returns "Unhandled Exception

An unhandled exception was thrown by the application."
I have an app on a shared hosting style setup using fastcgi
when i try to diagnose the problem using runserver, it returns this:
(memory error) sounds like you are out of RAM
that's the first thing i checked and free -m returns this:

You can have free memory but still run out of memory if there are ulimits set. What is the output of
    ulimit -a
hmm, those memory limits look alright (200megs). Maybe it is the low open files limit which is the issue? Try setting it higher
